page.title: 09JOSEPHINE'S DAY.
page.content: In{Hillsview Junior School}in Newcastle you start at 8.50am.You come in and sit down at your desk till the teacher takes the register.We get our pencils and rough books out.We often do some language work till assembly at 10am.Playtime is at 10.15. After play we usually have maths then we might sit on the carpet while the teacher reads us a story.Lunch is at noon and lasts for an hour.In the afternoon we have Environmental Studies, P.E. or Games and painting.If we are lucky we might hear the next episode of our serial story.At 3pm. the bell goes for home time.We put our chairs up and we go home.When I get home I have my tea,then I watch T.V. for 3 hours,then I go to bed for a long sleep,till zzzzz the alarm goes off.{ Josephine,aged 10 {
